verbs.name: look
verbs.description: Describes the current location or a specific object.

verbs.name: go
verbs.description: Moves the player in a specified direction (north, south, east, west, up, down).

verbs.name: get
verbs.description: Picks up an item from the location and adds it to the player's inventory.

verbs.name: drop
verbs.description: Removes an item from the player's inventory and leaves it in the current location.

verbs.name: inventory
verbs.description: Lists the items currently held by the player.

verbs.name: attack
verbs.description: Initiates combat with an enemy using the equipped weapon.

verbs.name: use
verbs.description: Uses an item, either on the player or the environment.

verbs.name: talk
verbs.description: Initiates a conversation with an NPC.

verbs.name: examine
verbs.description: Provides a more detailed description of an object or character.

verbs.name: equip
verbs.description: Equips a weapon or armor from the inventory.

verbs.name: help
verbs.description: Displays a list of available commands or information about a specific command.
